Command.Command.TooltipDescription: On this tab you find the common edit features. Click the button to load a document to play around.

Command.Name: cmdButtonSave
Command.TooltipDescription: Save the current file to disc.

Command.Name: cmdButtonCut
Command.TooltipDescription: Cut selection and copy to clipboard.

Command.Name: cmdButtonPasteImage
Command.TooltipTitle: Paste Image from clipboard (creates an image element to a temp path)

Command.Name: cmdButtonSearch
Command.Command.TooltipDescription:
Search is implemented straight forward. You have some options controlled by parameters of the Find method.
The call loops from last caret position or, if the document is freshly loaded, from the beginning. The words found are highlighted by inverse colors.

Command.Name: cmdButtonReplace
Command.Command.TooltipDescription:
Replace is implemented straight forward. You have some options controlled by parameters of the Replace method.
The call loops from last caret position or, if the document is freshly loaded, from the beginning. The words found are highlighted by inverse colors.

Command.Name: cmdGridColor
Command.LabelDescription: The color of all grid elements

Command.Name: cmdGridStyle
Command.LabelDescription: The style of the cross elements

Command.Name: cmdControlAttachEvent
Command.Command.TooltipTitle: Attach the selected events to elements.
Command.Command.TooltipDescription:
Using this command you can attach the elements select in the right most button to the events in the middle button. The buttons open menus with checkboxes. You can select as many events and elements as you like.
Check event tips for more information.

Command.Name: cmdControlEventNameResize
Command.TooltipDescription: This event fires quite often an can decrease performance drastically. Use with caution.

Command.Name: cmdControlEventNameMove
Command.TooltipDescription: This event fires quite often an can decrease performance drastically. Use with caution.

Command.Name: cmdControlEventNameDrag
Command.TooltipDescription: This event fires quite often an can decrease performance drastically. Use with caution.

Command.Name: cmdControlEventNameDragOver
Command.TooltipDescription: This event fires quite often an can decrease performance drastically. Use with caution.
